content: Any Binary resources (including contained Binary resources) are having the "content" (STU3) and "data" (R4) properties converted to externalized storage extensions using hapi-fhir-jpaserver-starter@rel_4_2_0. According to documentation, the default is to behave the same as it always has and include the Binary data/content directly in the resource. Any idea why externalized storage is being used by default?
Also posted my question to the google group: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/hapi-fhir/p4L7DfTyz-4

Just to bring closure to this, the JPA Starter project had a bad default setting for its externalized binary storage feature (it was enabled by default). Sean has already submitted a PR to fix this and it's been merged.
